title: The default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When the default value in the list box of the report parameter is modified, the modified value is not retained.
EB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter should be preserved even after modifying it.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display Type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa', and click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
